english.segment1: Because a machine. Could burn the life out of me. Not the same when I try. It's just a bad lullaby
english.segment2: When I learn to sing. I'll change the key of everything. When I learn to read. I'll change my ways on everything
english.segment3: You know the worries. Just the things I sing about me. Not the same when I try. It's just a bad lullaby
english.segment4: When I learn to sing. I'll change the key of everything. When I learn to read. I'll change my ways on everything
